mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.PRODUCT_FILE_NAME FROM bbs_cart_tb A LEFT JOIN bbs_product_file_tb B ON A.CART_ORDER = B.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE A.CART_STATE = 'Y' AND A.CART_MEMBER = #{CART_MEMBER} AND B.PRODUCT_FILE_NAME = ANY ( SELECT MIN(B.PRODUCT_FILE_NAME) FROM bbs_product_file_tb B WHERE B.PRODUCT_FILE_STATE = 'Y' AND B.PRODUCT_SEQ = A.CART_ORDER ) ORDER BY A.CART_SEQ DESC

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(A.CART_SEQ), 0) FROM bbs_cart_tb A LEFT JOIN bbs_product_tb B ON A.CART_ORDER = B.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE A.CART_STATE = #{CART_STATE} AND A.CART_MEMBER = #{CART_MEMBER} AND B.PRODUCT_SALE_MODE = ANY ( SELECT B.PRODUCT_SALE_MODE FROM bbs_product_tb B WHERE B.PRODUCT_SALE_MODE = 'SLEEVE' GROUP BY B.PRODUCT_SEQ )
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM bbs_cart_tb WHERE CART_SEQ IN (#{CART_SEQ}) AND CART_MEMBER = #{CART_MEMBER} ) AS SUCCESS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_cart_tb ( CART_ORDER, CART_MEMBER, CART_PRODUCT_NUM, CART_PRODUCT_NAME, CART_PRODUCT_OPTION, CART_PRODUCT_QTY, CART_PRODUCT_PRICE, CART_PRODUCT_SALE, CART_PRODUCT_SELL, CART_DATE ) VALUES ( #{CART_ORDER}, #{CART_MEMBER}, #{CART_PRODUCT_NUM}, #{CART_PRODUCT_NAME}, #{CART_PRODUCT_OPTION}, #{CART_PRODUCT_QTY}, #{CART_PRODUCT_PRICE}, #{CART_PRODUCT_SALE}, #{CART_PRODUCT_SELL}, Now() );
